title: Panache reactive native application error (vert.x-event-loop-thread-1) on official Hibernate reactive quickstart production deployment.
body:
### Describe the bug

Occasional/often making an HTTP call to `/fruits` results in server error. Sometimes the app works but mostly will crash.

### Expected behavior

Request to `/fruits` should give a list of fruits.

### Actual behavior

Server error with timeout.

### How to Reproduce?

Reproducer: https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus-quickstarts/tree/main/hibernate-reactive-quickstart

Setps to reproduce:

1. Build native app `./mvnw package -Pnative`
2. Build micro docker image
3. Deploy to Azure App Service.

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

Azure App Service - Linux

openjdk version "11.0.14.1" 2022-02-08

_No response_

### Quarkus version or git rev

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

Docker
